name: DanceCat
tagline: A Data Reporting tool by Flask.
body:
# About DanceCat
-----------
DanceCat is a Data Reporting web tool by Python's Flask Framework. In version `0.1.0` you can:
* Add, edit and test connections to databases.
* Create and edit **Query Data** jobs which you can execute and store results to Redislite using [Flask-Redislite](https://github.com/scattm/FlaskRedislite). Results can be get later via DanceCat or sending direct email.
* Scheduling **Query Data** jobs by *Hourly*, *Daily*, *Weekly* and *Monthly*. You can also schedule the job to be run *once* at some point.

### Code status
[![Code Health](https://landscape.io/github/scattm/DanceCat/master/landscape.svg?style=flat)](https://landscape.io/github/scattm/DanceCat/master)
[![Code Issues](https://www.quantifiedcode.com/api/v1/project/a717f58a1b9f429f98f7814e6a34f509/badge.svg)](https://www.quantifiedcode.com/app/project/a717f58a1b9f429f98f7814e6a34f509)

### Supporting Database:
* MySQL using `mysql-connector-python`
* SQL Server using `pymssql`
